description:
In 2016, the Jenkins project participated in Google Summer of Code. It is a major educational event, where students contribute to open source projects on a full-time basis. We had several projects in Jenkins and we would like to share our experience in this community activity.

This session will share the experiences of the Jenkins organization admins and mentors during the project. We will also present projects that have been completed this year.
